intelligence or algorithmic intelligence ai technologies is expressly prohibited 4 the six basic stitches and two knots slip knot every crochet pattern starts with either a slip knot or a magic_ring this pattern begins with a slip knot which can be made in a variety of ways but all of them are essentially an incomplete square knot where you tighten a loop on itself instead of pulling the string ends through figure 1 making a slip knot start by holding your first yarn with the loose end going over your pointer finger and held by your other hand use your other hand to pull up the working end of the yarn so your first hand s pointer finger and thumb can grab it allow the loop to fall off your fingers as you pull the working end through and then pull tight this is a slip knot put your hook through the loop and pull on the working end the loop should tighten around the hook you are now ready to start chaining copyright © 2025 by megyn burnett all rights reserved this pattern is for your hook do this as many times as needed for a pattern you will either start crocheting from the chains next to or near the hook or will slip_stitch into a chain to make a chain space many patterns this one included will have you crochet into a chain space literally a space made by chains in the pattern rather than into previously made stitches the abbreviation for a chain is typically written as chain slip_stitch figure 3 making a slip_stitch source fity club a slip_stitch is where you insert a hook into a stitch below yarn
